updates.text: Train service has resumed. Free bus and shuttle bus services are still available between Joo Koon & Jurong East.
Train service has resumed. Free bus and shuttle bus services are still available.
We are in the process of recovering the train that stalled between Joo Koon & Pioneer MRT stations to enable the resumption of train svc.
No train service between Joo Koon & Boon Lay in both directions. Free bus and shuttle bus service is avail between Joo Koon & Jurong East.
Additional 10mins traveling time between Boon Lay and Jurong East in both directions due to power fault.
No train service between Joo Koon and  Boon Lay  in both directions due to power fault.
Estimated 20mins additional traveling time between Joo Koon and Jurong East, in the both directions due to traction power fault.
Estimated 20mins additional traveling time between Joo Koon and Boon Lay,in the both directions due to traction power fault.
